title: FS: Looking to downgrade PSA 4 Johnny Kling
author: jamest206

posts.post_title: FS: Looking to downgrade PSA 4 Johnny Kling
posts.post_content:
Before I put this card up for auction on ebay, figured I would see if anyone is interested in trading my PSA 4 Johnny Kling for a PSA 1 or 2 Kling, and cash.

Also, would be willing to trade for T206 portraits, that have a sum equal to value of this card.  

Feel free to PM me if interested, or email for scans of card.  [url]jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
